author: rcm
msg: Added the ability to check whether an association can be made.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed tree browser problem where collection would fail to reopen as collection.  It was set up to show an object, and so ignored the collection.

author: rcm
msg: Tidied up the mechanism for creating menu options for each of the action methods.  This has a fixed a problem where class methods where run as object methods.  Additionally checked the results of the methods to determine if the associate method should be called to create an association from a newly created object.

author: rcm
msg: All window views are now created so they are as large as they need to be to fully display their complete contents.
On layout all views within a workspace have their borders limited so they dispay within that workspace.
In addition to the above limits being imposed the browser frame will reduce the size of the right hand pane so it is accommodated by the reduced frame.
Laying out the browser frame so that the left and right pane are the same height, accommodating all the content in each pane.
Forced the spy window to be hidden.  It is still updating the detials, just not showing it.
